NK036(chi)021:1: // bi ma snying thig gi spros med dbang dkyil ni
NK036(chi)021:2: gzhi mthing ga mthar 'od lnga'i ra bas bskor ba'i
NK036(chi)021:3: dbus su bum pa bsnol ma gnyis ka dmar po
NK036(chi)021:4: mgul chings dar ljang khu pad+ma dmar po shing los
NK036(chi)021:5: brgyan pa zhabs gnyis la sna tshogs pad gdan steng
NK036(chi)021:6: ma'i zhabs mdun dang 'og ma'i zhabs lhor bstan to
NK036(chi)021:7: // zhabs gnyis mtshams su thig le dkar po /
NK036(chi)021:8: de bzhin lho nub tu ser po /
NK036(chi)021:10: byang shar ljang gu so so la 'od lngas 'di
NK036(chi)021:11: ltar bskor te thams cad kyang reg thug med par
NK036(chi)021:12: bri / spros med dkyil 'khor 'di la bri tshul
NK036(chi)021:13: mi 'dra ba yod kyang kun mkhyen chen po'i yig
NK036(chi)021:14: cha las 'byung ba ltar yin pas yid ches kyi
NK036(chi)021:15: bri / gnas yin la / 'di'i thig 'debs tshul zab mo yang thig tu yang gsungs /
